job.command:
#setup 64b #setup gcc #starver .DEV2 #starver eval cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} #root.exe -q -b 'bfc.C(1000000,"EandBDir,Corr4","@'${FILELIST}'",0,"'${JOBID}'.root")' >& ${JOBID}B.log #root.exe -q -b 'bfc.C(1000000,"EandBDir,Corr6,OSectorAlign","@'${FILELIST}'",0,"'${JOBID}'.root")' >& ${JOBID}B.log #root.exe -q -b 'bfc.C(1000000,"EandBDir,ExB","@'${FILELIST}'",0,"'${JOBID}'.root")' >& ${JOBID}B.log #root.exe -q -b 'bfc.C(1000000,"EandBDir,ExB,OShortR","@'${FILELIST}'",0,"'${JOBID}'.root")' >& ${JOBID}B.log #root.exe -q -b 'bfc.C(1000000,"EandBDir,ExB,OShortR,OBmap","@'${FILELIST}'",0,"'${JOBID}'.root")' >& ${JOBID}B.log #root.exe -q -b 'bfc.C(1000000,"EandBDir,CorrX","@'${FILELIST}'",0,"'${JOBID}'.root")' >& ${JOBID}B.log ## set filel = `basename ${INPUTFILE0}` # set filel = `basename ${INPUTFILE0} .event.root` # set output = ${filel}.root # if (-r ${output}) exit 0; # set logFile = ${filel}B.log ##root.exe -q -b 'bfc.C(1000000,"EandBDir,CorrX","'${INPUTFILE0}'*.event.root",0,"'${output}'")' >& ${logFile} #root.exe -q -b 'bfc.C(1000000,"EandBDir,CorrX","'${INPUTFILE0}'",0,"'${output}'")' >& ${logFile}
foreach input (`cat $FILELIST`) # set filel = `basename ${input}` set filel = `basename ${input} .event.root` set output = ${filel}.root if (! -r ${output}) then set logFile = ${filel}B.log root.exe -q -b 'bfc.C(1000000,"EandBDir,CorrZ,quiet","'${input}'",0,"'${output}'")' >& ${logFile} endif end
